title: Sylvie Goulard to face second hearing on Thursday
text:
rench commissioner candidate Sylvie Goulard will face a second hearing in the European Parliament | Kenzo Tribuillard/AFP via Getty Images Sylvie Goulard to face second hearing on Thursday France’s commissioner-designate failed to convince MEPs she had been cleared of legal and ethical woes.

The French commissioner candidate Sylvie Goulard will face a second hearing in the European Parliament on Thursday at 9:30 a.m.

The decision was taken at a meeting of the coordinators of the European Parliament’s industry and internal market committees Wednesday morning, five people confirmed to POLITICO.

The internal market commissioner-designate failed to convince MEPs she has been cleared of all legal and ethical woes in a first hearing last week. On Tuesday, she sent them 58-pages of additional written answers to questions.

At Wednesday morning’s meeting, all groups except Renew Europe (Goulard’s own party) and the Socialists and Democrats said her answers to the questions were insufficient, according to three people.

The additional hearing on Thursday will be one and a half hours long, two people said.

There will be a coordinators meeting tomorrow afternoon following the hearing to determine whether Goulard has the support of MEPs.
description: France’s commissioner-designate failed to convince MEPs she had been cleared of legal and ethical woes.
